zhongkem@... wrote:
>     I am using heritrix 1.14.3..
>     I just want use heritrix to crawl some wsdl document,but after several  attempts��I found it too hard.
> my problem:
>     http://xmethods.net/��this website has many links to other website which has many wsdl documents,for example ,it may has the link:http://soamoa.org:9292/artistRegistry?WSDL  ,this is what I want!
>    if I use DecidingScope,it seems can't get to http://soamoa.org:9292/artistRegistry?WSDL ,so can't download the wsdl.
>    if I use BroadScope,this may return too many links,which may  take long days to get to http://soamoa.org:9292/artistRegistry?WSDL !
> 
>    so what can I do,if I want to download http://soamoa.org:9292/artistRegistry?WSDL ,but don't need wait so long!
>    Can you help me ? Thank you for your attention!

If <http://soamoa.org:9292/artistRegistry?WSDL> is the URL you want, you 
should add it as a seed -- then you don't have to wait for it to be 
discovered.

- Gordon @ IA
